parameters.query:
INSERT INTO autocategoria_desk (id, category, sub_category, type_category, auto_category)
VALUES ('{{ $json.chave }}', '{{ $json.categoria }}', '{{ $json.subcategoria }}', '{{ $json.tipo }}', '{{ $json.categoria }} - {{ $json.subcategoria }} - {{ $json.tipo }}');

INSERT INTO status_desk (id, sequence_id, name)
VALUES ('{{ $json.Chave }}', '{{ $json.Sequencia }}', '{{ $json.Nome }}');

INSERT INTO grupo_empresas_desk (company_id, company_name, group_company_id, group_company_name)
VALUES ('{{ $json.empresa_id }}', '{{ $json.name.replace(/'/g, "''") }}', '{{ $json.codigo_sequencia }}', '{{ $json.grupo_nome.replace(/'/g, "''") }}')

UPDATE status_desk
SET is_enabled = CASE
  WHEN id IN ('1330','368') THEN false
  ELSE true
END;

INSERT INTO empresas_desk (
  id,
  fantasy_name,
  social_responsibility_name
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.Chave }}',
  '{{ $json.Fantasia.replace(/'/g, "''") }}',
  '{{ $json.RazaoSocial.replace(/'/g, "''") }}'
)
select fantasy_name from empresas_desk where id = '{{ $json.data.TUsuario.CodCliente }}'
select fantasy_name from empresas_desk where id = '{{ $json.data.TUsuario.CodCliente }}'

update empresas_desk set
    fantasy_name = '{{ $json.data.TCliente.Fantasia }}',
    social_responsibility_name = '{{ $json.data.TCliente.RazaoSocial }}'
  where id = '{{ $json.data.TCliente.Chave[0] }}'

INSERT INTO empresas_desk (
  id,
  fantasy_name,
  social_responsibility_name
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.data.TCliente.Chave[0] }}',
  '{{ $json.data.TCliente.Fantasia }}',
  '{{ $json.data.TCliente.RazaoSocial }}'
)

INSERT INTO causa_desk (id, sequence_id, name)
VALUES ('{{ $json.Chave }}', '{{ $json.Sequencia }}', '{{ $json.Nome }}');
